 void checkEnemyHit()
          This method checks for an intersecting enemy If it finds either an edible enemy (good) or a killer enemy (bad) it acts appropriately - either adding a point, or killing the player

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.World

checkDeath

public boolean checkDeath()

checkEnemyHit

public void checkEnemyHit()
This method checks for an intersecting enemy If it finds either an edible enemy (good) or a killer enemy (bad) it acts appropriately - either adding a point, or killing the player

checkForcedMovement

public void checkForcedMovement()
Calls getSurface() from the Pengu class. If the player is standing on a moving platform, and nothing is blocking their path, this method will move the player.

checkHealth

public void checkHealth()
Checks the player's health with each turn and updates the health bar and face to reflect number.

endGameLose

public void endGameLose()
Triggers the losing screen - tell player how many bees they were successful in eating.

switchWorld

public void switchWorld(Player player)
Method that will be implemented by each of the subclasses to switch world.
